contact_info.hours: Monday through Friday from 8:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. EST

instructions.step_1: Check to make sure the mailing address above is correct. Print any corrections in the box below on the right. Any corrections must match your ID
instructions.step_2: Your signature and date of birth are required to determine your eligibility.
instructions.step_3: Attach a copy of your identification.
instructions.step_4: Send form and copy of ID in the enclosed self-addressed envelope, or mail to: Attn: Consumer Relations, P.O. Box 2959, Winston-Salem, NC 27102

disclaimer: Offer Restricted to Smokers 21 Years of Age or Older. We do not sell the names on our lists to anyone.
